        Kernel main driver behind Taskomatic

        java.lang.InstantiationException - thrown if this.scheduler can't be initialized.

      • startup

        public void startup()
             throws TaskomaticException
        Starts Taskomatic This method does not return until the this.scheduler is shutdown
        Throws:
        TaskomaticException - error occurred during Quartz or Hibernate startup

      • startShutdown

        public void startShutdown()
        Initiates the shutdown process. Needs to happen in a separate thread to prevent Quartz scheduler errors.

        Shutsdown the application
